patthana18.8:1.1_0: Hetuṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:3.1_0: Hetuṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:4.1_0: Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:5.1_0: Hetuṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:6.1_0: Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:7.1_0: Hetuṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.8:8.1_0: Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
